name: Senderos (Valérian CHORGNON - 2D Artist)
description:
Game created during Game Pratic 2017, a game jam where the goal is to make a playable game in 48 hours respecting the given theme. 

We chose to work on the journey of the pilgrims to Santiago de Compostela. You play as one of these pilgrims set off on a journey through various villages in the south of France. The game is like a contemplative and informative walk in which you meet different typical places and peronnages. Like a real pilgrim, you have a notebook that you will fill with tampons, proof of your passage in some cities.
